meaningMnemonic: I'm going to <kanji> chastise</kanji> you about this <kanji>theory</kanji>. When I do this, this is a <vocabulary>debate</vocabulary>. Doesn't it feel like you're being chastised when people are debating with you sometimes, especially with your own theories? I think so.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
